extendedInfo.description: Whats The Word in Russian!Addictive photo puzzle game Whats The Word is the continuation of Icomaina and 4 Pics 1 Word game series. Guess, what is hidden behind the gray cells?The word characterizing the closed picture should be founded out. You can open 6 photo fragments to start. If intuition doesnât tell you anything, you can use the hints. However, the fewer clues you use, the more points you score!Whats The Word:- Lots of fun and challenging tasks that help to broaden your mind and vocabulary;- Exciting quiz for FREE;- RUSSIAN edition.Keywords: guessing games, Whats app, brain teaser, foto quiz, whats the icon, whats the brand, 1 Pic 1 Word, guess the picture games.
